title: Pisces Compatibility: The Most Incompatible Signs for Pisces

steps.title: Gemini (May 21 - June 20):
steps.content: Gemini (May 21 - June 20): Pisces are often on the lookout for a secure, committed relationship, while Geminis tend to take a more free-spirited approach to romance. This match-up doesn’t have a lot of natural compatibility, but their relationship can work out if both signs are willing to meet in the middle. Compatibility Tip: Geminis are very independent, so it’s really important to give them a sense of freedom. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. For example, Gemini could spend the day hanging out with friends and dedicate the evening to some quality time with Pisces.

steps.title: Sagittarius (November 22 - December 1):
steps.content: Sagittarius (November 22 - December 1): Sagittarius tends to say it like it is, and isn’t afraid to mince words. Unfortunately, the deeply empathetic and sensitive Pisces might read a little too deeply into what Sag is saying. Both signs need to focus on finding a way to cater to each other’s emotional preferences. Compatibility Tip: Always speak from the heart when talking to Pisces. This sign hates being spoken to in a cold, clinical way. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Reader Poll: We asked 706 wikiHow readers what their biggest dealbreaker is as a Pisces and 62% of them said someone who lies. [Take Poll] While it’s important to be honest with a Pisces, make sure you aren’t too blunt so you don’t hurt their feelings.

steps.title: Libra (September 23 - October 22):
steps.content: Libra (September 23 - October 22): Libra isn’t big on commitment, while Pisces wants nothing more than a loving, devoted partnership. Both signs need to be direct and upfront about what they hope to get out of the relationship, rather than smothering their true feelings in the name of “harmony." Compatibility Tip: When having a discussion with Libra, try to keep the conversation as refined and intellectual as possible. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. These qualities are often important to Libras, and can go a long way in your conversations.

steps.title: Aries (March 21 - April 19):
steps.content: Aries (March 21 - April 19): Aries and Pisces complement each other well, but Aries’s direct, to-the-point style of conflict resolution may leave Pisces too nervous to share their true feelings. Both signs need to create a safe, calm space to feel heard and discuss what’s on their mind. Compatibility Tip: Don’t be too rigid and demanding with a Pisces! This sign really values flexibility, and will likely leave a relationship where they feel restricted. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Leo (July 23 - August 22):
steps.content: Leo (July 23 - August 22): Leo tends to be loud and proud, while Pisces likes to be quieter and direct. Despite their differences, this duo can forge a powerful path together by focusing on their creativity, passion, and love for one another. Compatibility Tip: Don’t be afraid to be affectionate with Leo! As the most affectionate sign in the zodiac, Leos love to touch and be touched, and they definitely aren’t shy about public displays of affection. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022.

steps.title: Aquarius (January 20 - February 18):
steps.content: Aquarius (January 20 - February 18): Aquarius tends to travel off the beaten path, and sometimes has trouble being known and understood by the people around them. Empathetic Pisces is great at making Aquarius feel seen and understood—the key is finding a balance between Aquarius’s need for space and Pisces’s need for quality time. Compatibility Tip: Look for ways to spend time with Aquarius by take up some hobbies and interests that Aquarius enjoys, like playing the same video games or going to the same conventions. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Cancer (June 21 - July 22):
steps.content: Cancer (June 21 - July 22): Both of these signs are ruled by intuition and have no trouble tuning into their partner’s thoughts and feelings. Although they’re both water signs, this duo is unlikely to make any ripples or waves in their relationship. You can expect plenty of smooth sailing with these 2! Compatibility Tip: Provide plenty of love and emotional support to Cancer, especially when they’re having a rough day. This sensitive sign loves knowing that their partner is in their corner! Curious which zodiac signs are Pisces soulmate material? Find out in the lively discussion happening over at wikiHow's "Which signs have soulmate compatibility with Pisces" forum !

steps.title: Scorpio (October 23 - November 21):
steps.content: Scorpio (October 23 - November 21): Scorpio and Pisces both value and prioritize the depths of their own emotions, and feel comfortable exploring them with complete honesty and transparency. A Scorpio-Pisces pairing is definitely in it for the long haul! Compatibility Tip: Make an effort to be really accountable and upfront with Scorpio. They can be very tense at first, but they’re able to relax when they know that you’re very trustworthy and solid. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: Taurus (April 20 - May 20):
steps.content: Taurus (April 20 - May 20): Taurus is all about hearth and home, and Pisces is more than happy to stoke the flames. Even if they disagree on something, their love and support for each other will allow them to work through just about any conflict. Compatibility Tip: Taurus is really grounded in their senses, and prefers expressing and experiencing love in more physical ways. With this in mind, try not to get too emotional and wordy too quickly. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Capricorn (December 22 - January 19):
steps.content: Capricorn (December 22 - January 19): Pisces can help Capricorn learn to come out of their emotional shell, while Capricorn can help support and nurture Pisces’s creative sense of self. Together, these signs help one another grow into the best versions of themselves. Compatibility Tip: Let Capricorn move, learn, and grow at their own pace. They need the time and space to move slowly and intentionally in a really structured way. [9] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019.

steps.title: Virgo (August 23 - September 22):
steps.content: Virgo (August 23 - September 22): Pisces is super flexible, and won’t be put off by Virgo’s attention to detail. [10] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. It doesn’t hurt that Pisces really loves Virgo’s sense of structure and organization, too. Compatibility Tip: Virgos like honesty, availability, and cleanliness. [11] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Try to really embody those traits to forge a stronger connection with them.

steps.title: Pisces (February 19 - March 20):
steps.content: Pisces (February 19 - March 20): Pisces is known for their flexibility—but this can be a little challenging when both partners are always willing to compromise. This pair of fish can truly thrive when they find a way to clearly and respectfully share their needs and wants with one another. Compatibility Tip: Pisces are all about vibes, instincts, and feelings. Try to keep good energy and positivity flowing around each other—aggressiveness doesn’t sit very well with this sign. [12] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022.
